system.description:
Effect: This action can only be taken while the user has the @Affliction[grapple] Affliction.
Pick one of the following 3 effects:

  • If the user is in control of the @Affliction[grapple], they may a Lift check, gaining a bonus/penalty based on the difference in Weight Classes between the user, their allies and their target(s), calculated as: 10 * (usersCatMod-targetsCatMod)/2. On success, the user may use Breaking Hold on any number of target in the @Affliction[grapple]. On a failure nothing happens, but the user stays in control of the @Affliction[grapple].
  • If the user is in control of the @Affliction[grapple], they may escape the @Affliction[grapple].
  • If the user is not in control of the @Affliction[grapple], they may make Lift Check (same rules as above) to break free or take control of the @Affliction[grapple]. On succeess, the user may choose to escape the @Affliction[grapple] or take control of the @Affliction[grapple].
